com.googlecode.prmf.merapi.net.irc.event
Interface IrcEventListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractIrcEventListener
public interface IrcEventListener
extends EventListener

A listener for IRC protocol events (commands).

Author:
Miorel-Lucian Palii

Method Summary
 void errorEvent(IrcEvent<ErrorCommand> event)
          Invoked when an IRC error is received.
 void inviteEvent(IrcEvent<InviteCommand> event)
          Invoked on receipt of an invitation to join a channel.
 void joinEvent(IrcEvent<JoinCommand> event)
          Invoked when someone joins a channel.
 void kickEvent(IrcEvent<KickCommand> event)
          Invoked when someone gets kicked from a channel.
 void nickEvent(IrcEvent<NickCommand> event)
          Invoked when someone changes IRC nicks.
 void noticeEvent(IrcEvent<NoticeCommand> event)
          Invoked on receipt of a notice.
 void partEvent(IrcEvent<PartCommand> event)
          Invoked when someone leaves a channel.
 void pingEvent(IrcEvent<PingCommand> event)
          Invoked on a ping.
 void privmsgEvent(IrcEvent<PrivmsgCommand> event)
          Invoked on receipt of a private message.
 void quitEvent(IrcEvent<QuitCommand> event)
          Invoked when someone quits the IRC network.
 void unknownCommandEvent(IrcEvent<UnknownCommand> event)
          Invoked when an unrecognized command is received.
 void unknwonCtcpEvent(IrcEvent<CtcpCommand> event)
          Invoked when an unrecognized client-to-client protocol (CTCP) command is received.

privmsgEvent

void privmsgEvent(IrcEvent<PrivmsgCommand> event)
Invoked on receipt of a private message. This is a misnomer, since IRC private messages can be sent to an entire channel.

Parameters:
event - an event object

Invoked when an unrecognized client-to-client protocol (CTCP) command is received.

event - an event object

errorEvent

void errorEvent(IrcEvent<ErrorCommand> event)
Invoked when an IRC error is received. This probably means the client is about to be disconnected.

Parameters:
event - an event object
